title: My phone never got delivered. I called mutiple times but no one can tell me when they will refund.
content: I didn't receive my phone.after waiting for 3 weeks.called customer services mutiple times. Other than being told that it has been escalated and the rep I spoke to will.contact me,nothing happened .No one contacted me..I was just asking a simple.question - about when it will be refunded. 1 month?2 month or a year? It should not be that difficult. I don't remember the last time I have this bad customer service experiences.
